references:
We start by summarizing the basics of FL and its de facto algorithm FedAvg with unbiased client sampling. Then, we introduce the proposed adaptive client sampling in wireless networks with statistical and system heterogeneity based on FedAvg. Finally, we present our formulated optimization problem. We summarize all key notations in this
paper in Table I.
